concise_definition: n. 唱歌, 唱诵; v. 唱 (sing 的现在分词和动名词形式)

definitions.explanation_en: The act or art of producing musical sounds with the voice, often following a melody and rhythm, typically as a form of artistic expression or entertainment.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用嗓音发出带有旋律和节奏的音乐声音的行为或艺术，通常作为艺术表达或娱乐形式。
definitions.example_en: Her singing at the concert moved the entire audience to tears.
definitions.example_cn: 她在音乐会上的演唱感动了全场观众，令他们热泪盈眶。

definitions.explanation_en: The sound produced by birds or other animals when they vocalize melodically, often as part of communication or territorial behavior.
definitions.explanation_cn: 鸟类或其他动物以悦耳的鸣叫发出的声音，常用于交流或宣示领地。
definitions.example_en: The singing of the birds at dawn filled the forest with life.
definitions.example_cn: 黎明时分鸟儿的鸣唱让森林充满了生机。

definitions.explanation_en: To produce musical tones with the voice, especially in a structured or melodic way, often as part of a song or performance.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用嗓音发出有结构或旋律的音乐音调，通常作为歌曲或表演的一部分。
definitions.example_en: He was singing along to his favorite song while driving.
definitions.example_cn: 他开车时正跟着自己最爱的歌哼唱。

comparison.analysis: “Chanting”（吟诵）通常指重复单调的音节或短语，常用于宗教、仪式或抗议场合，强调节奏和集体性，缺乏旋律变化。而 “singing” 更注重音乐性、旋律和情感表达，形式更自由多样。
“Humming”（哼唱）是闭口发出的、无歌词的简单旋律，通常不具正式表演性质，多为无意识或放松时的行为。而 “singing” 包含清晰的音高、歌词和发声技巧，是一种有意识的音乐表达。
“Voicing”（发声）是一个更宽泛的术语，泛指任何使用声音的行为，包括说话、喊叫、叹息等，不一定涉及音乐。而 “singing” 特指有旋律和节奏的音乐性发声，是 “voicing” 的一种特定形式。
